Description: 93 Walk Score! - One bedroom, almost 1000 square feet of space, island kitchen. - Luxury loft style units located minutes from downtown Boston and Cambridge! Each unit has been tastefully renovated and features in unit laundry, oversized windows, gleaming hardwood floors, high ceilings, and modern styled kitchens with all appliances. - If you were looking for heaven and found Fourth & Broadway, you wouldn't know know the difference.
